org.ensor.data.atom.json

Class JSONStringSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ensor.data.atom.json.JSONStringSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISerializer<String,String>

    public final class JSONStringSerializer
extends Object
implements ISerializer<String,String>
    This class implements a serializer which converts data from JSON strings into dictionaries and back again.
    Author:
    jona
